text: @Keir_Starmer Sorry, no. Black people are almost twice as likely to die from Coronavirus even taking into account of socioeconomic conditions. There is another reason. Genetic/Vitamin D issues are possibilities. No-one actually knows for sure. It's not an excuse for socialism!
